text: I probably screwed up

[Pim] booking the hotel. I admit to that.
[Charlie] You did. You did screw up.
What you guys don't realize is I—
I admit I probably screwed up.
I'm saying I do not remember that I had to book the hotel.

[Charlie] Why do you keep bringing that up, dude?
[Pim] But what I'm saying now is
I'm trying to figure out a solution.
Dude, that's irrelevant. That's irrelevant.
And it seems like you guys are just, like, ganging up on me.
We're not ganging up on you, dude.
We're not— We're ...
You're throwing something ...
We're trying to figure out a solution.
Okay, four waters and French fries.
Okay. Thank you. Yes. Yeah.
Yeah, the French— French fries are right here.
Thank you.
Okay.
I mean,
I guess ...
Alright, even if we don't ask The Boss for money necessarily,
it'd be good to maybe get some opinions from The Boss.
He might have an idea.
I agree.
Yeah.
I definitely agree. I was gonna say that before, actually.
We should call The Boss.
Yeah, yeah. I think— I think there's no harm in it.
Uh, even if, you know, he can't necessarily help us,
he might give us a suggestion or an idea.
He might— He might know somebody here.
I know he's got connections and stuff, so maybe ...
I'll call him. I can call him.
Yeah, I was gonna say. Do you mind?
'Cause my phone's like super—

[Charlie] Super low battery.
[Alan] It's alright. Yeah.
Yeah, I've got a little bit of battery left.
[Dialling tone]
Um ...
[Mr. Boss] Hello?
Hey, uh, Mr. Boss. It's Alan calling.
I'm with Pim, Charlie, and Glep right now.
[Mr. Boss] Oh, hey, guys.
Yeah, hey. How's it going?
Hey, um, Mr. Boss. It's Pim here.
Um ...
We're just calling because we're in Brazil right now,
and, um, we kind of screwed up a little bit.
At least I did.
Uh, we don't have a hotel, and we're just wondering
if you had any ideas of maybe, like, you know—
You know someone here that we can stay with
or maybe something that we can do.
[Mr. Boss] Oh, geez. I don't know.
Yeah.
Wait, you guys don't— You guys don't have a hotel?
No.
No, we thought we did.
Well, we thought we had one. But, um,
like, we were gonna get another hotel,
and I guess normally that wouldn't be a problem,
but right now it's Mardi Gras here in Brazil.
So, just everywhere is booked.
Everywhere is fully booked out. So ...
Which—
Yeah.
[Mr. Boss] Okay. Um ...
Well, shoot.
Um ...
Let me see.
Let me see.
[Sighs]
If— If you can't think of anything—
Guys, you chose— You chose the worst time to go.
You chose the worst time to go.

[Charlie] No, no. We know.
[Alan] Yeah, we know.
Yeah, we've already talked about that.
We can figure this out ourselves.
We're just wondering and it's obvious— Yeah.
[Mr. Boss] Yeah, I don't know.
We'll figure it out. We'll figure it out.
I think we'll be fine.
And thank you for, uh ...
Yeah. Thank you, Mr. Boss.
[Mr. Boss] Alright.

[Charlie] It was good talking—
[Mr. Boss] See you.
